error.TwoFactorCodeExpired: Your 2FA code is older than a dinosaur fossil. Try again!
error.emailDoesntExist: That email address is playing hide-and-seek. Are you sure you typed it right?
error.emailInUse: This email is already a VIP member. Try a different one!
error.expiredToken: Your token took a coffee break and forgot to come back. Please refresh!
error.generic: Oops! Something went wrong. We're blaming the gremlins.
error.invalid2FAToken: That 2FA code is about as accurate as a weather forecast. Try again!
error.invalidCredentials: Your username and password are having a disagreement. Please introduce them again.
error.invalidToken: Your token decided to go on vacation without you. Please get a new one.
error.noPasswordField: This user is living life on the edge, password-free! Try logging in differently.
error.noPermissions: You're trying to sneak into the VIP lounge without a pass. No can do!
error.noToken: Your token is missing in action. It might be hanging out with Elvis.
error.noUser: You're not authorized, but you *are* awesome! Try logging in or signing up.
error.parseError: These fields are a bit jumbled. It's like trying to read a cat's handwriting.
error.reusePassword: This password is feeling déjà vu. Please pick a fresh one!

success.confirmationEmailSent: Great! A confirmation email is on its way. Check your inbox (and spam folder, just in case).
success.emailVerified: Your email is verified and ready to party!
success.loggedIn: Welcome back! We missed you (not really, but it sounds nice).
success.passwordUpdated: Your password has had a makeover. It looks fabulous!
success.resetEmailSent: Don't worry, a reset email is winging its way to you right now.
success.productDeleted: Poof! The product vanished like a magician's rabbit.
success.productUpdated: Your product got an upgrade and is looking sharp!
success.categoryDeleted: That category is now history. Time to make a new one!
success.categoryUpdated: Your category got a fresh coat of paint. It's looking snazzy!
success.categoryCreated: A new category is born! It's like having a new baby (but without the diapers).
success.userDeleted: This user has left the building. We wish them well on their new adventures.
success.userUpdated: This user got a glow-up! Looking good!

misc.passwordAlreadyInUse: This password is already used by %, try something different
